name: configurable-bot-parameters
title: Configurable Bot Speed & Inventory Size
author: Yezirael
description: This mod adds a config options to increase or decrease the bot speed as well as inventory size of construction and/or logistic bots. Don't forget to change the settings! Based on the mod 'Configurable Bot Speed' from Lappro and 'Bot Inventories' from Ondra4260.
